title: lower fps,specially late game
body:
Hello,i really want to know why i have lag (drops to 5 fps late game).I tried lowering settings,and turning off sound still same....
My specs are:
4gb ram
Radeon hd 6570hd---i know its bad ;)
Amd phenom II x4 940 processor

replies.body:
After a bit of testing, and this may or may not help anyone else, but worth a shot.

Some HD6x are built in CPU graphics, which I was using myself and worked just fine for shorter games, but after a while it seemed the RAM would fill up and lag would begin.  Doubled the RAM and the game lasted longer before lag and it was less than before.  Got a PCI-e Graphics card shoved in and lag is all but gone now.

CPU built in graphics? Increase ram, but more importantly get a new card :)

So I went through the FPS Issues list and then some, cleaners, heat, etc. and still no change.  Will be attempting to get something a bit newer for graphics and see if that will help.  I don't imagine anyone reading this (if anyone actually does) with a similar card has the game running without lag?

-Gil

Might be an older thread, but seems I have the same issue with a very similar graphics - HD 6530D

Going to give the FPS Issues a run and see if that helps.  If not I wonder if it could simply be this series of HD 6xxx Graphic cards.

-Gil

Frame drops are usually caused by driver or hardware problems, but there could be game files failing to render properly.  If it's late game, it could even be something with baron.  My suggestion here would be go over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
